Comment: In the end is going to fail. Only issue is how much damage will be done by that time. Someone made a great post some months back on the difference between a place like Hungary and America. The former never experienced democratic rule in the first place.  America is in a sad place as of now, but it's not reached the end, and while I know it's hard to accept and believe, Trump and co. will fail nomatter what. It's not easy to undo an entire country overnight.
